extendedInfo.description: Are you still manually turning on airplane mode at night and off in the morning everyday?  Are you still manually turning on silent mode before a meeting and off after every time? It's time to go automatic!New permissions:* Modify USB storage: To save data files (and then to restore). * Read contact data: To pick contact and display contact name in blacklist.* Directly call phone numbers: To do blacklist blocking(end call).

reviews.title: great for all occasions
reviews.comment: Great for in the office and when I\'m getting into the car or train to head home. I also like it to make SURE that it will not ring during church service or reoccurring meetings. Truly a occasion saver!
reviews.author: Andre Dowdell

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very useful app. Brilliant to keep those late emails and texts quiet at night.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sets ring volume like its supposed too
reviews.comment: Removing because I am having issuses with my phone not playing specific tones for unique users.
reviews.author: Tim Waldo

reviews.title: Wonderful application
reviews.comment: Wonderful and reliable application.  Great app. Thank you for making the world better.
reviews.author: Lyubomir Dimitrov

reviews.title: No more mean looks from professors
reviews.comment: This is one of the most useful apps I\'ve found while being a student.
reviews.author: Allan Lepp

reviews.title: How about a whitelist?
reviews.comment: Nice app but needs whitelist capability. I turn all rings & notifications off at night but still would like a few callers to get through with emergencies.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ring scheduler
reviews.comment: I really do like this app. It comes in very handy everyday. It allows me to silence my ringers and not have to worry about turning them back on after meetings. It allows me to set multiple schedules and time settings in advance. It frees me from having to remember to turn off my ringers for regularly scheduled routine events. And I often times would forget to turn my ringer back on, but that\'s not a concern any more. This is am amazing app and well worth the price... :-)
reviews.author: Richard Lucas

reviews.title: fast set up
reviews.comment: This one is easy to use, others are complicated to set up if you just need a very simple wake/sleep routine or do not disturb type of feature.  I\'m sure it can do more, but if you just want to get it set up fast and then forget it, you can.
reviews.author: Jill angelichio

reviews.title: Amazingly great app
reviews.comment: This app is a must have app.
reviews.author: Ashu Pathak

reviews.title: Most effective and efficient
reviews.comment: No match for this amazing app. The best in android market.
reviews.author: Debapriya Kanjilal

reviews.title: Very stable program.
reviews.comment: At work we can face disciplinary action up to getting fired if our phones are out or if they make noise at the wrong time.  This pogrom makes it to where I don\'t have to think about it.  Set it to turn my ringer off 5 minutes before work and turn it back on 5 minutes after, problem solved.
reviews.author: Jayson Cooper

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Does exactly what I need it  to! No more ringing loud at work!!
reviews.author: Jahmezz Thompson

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: One improvement would be to creat a \"white list\" that is the opposite of the black list. Have a group of numbers that will continue to sound when sound is off. Middle of the night calls from kids and parents.
reviews.author: joe cline

reviews.title: Love love love this app.
reviews.comment: Have my phone on vibrate until my normal quitting time. Then normal ringtone. No more missed calls!!
reviews.author: Jenny Allen

reviews.title: No Xperia Z compatibility
reviews.comment: There seems to be issues with compatibility on the Xperia Z. It worked great and I loved it on my last phone, Samsung Admire. I NEED it on my new phone.
reviews.author: Christopher Barnes

reviews.title: Compatibility Issues
reviews.comment: Does not allow you to work Instagram while trying to record a video. Keeps prompting you to change settings and you can\'t record a video.
reviews.author: Kevin Koetsier

reviews.title: Brilliant app, works perfectly!
reviews.comment: Well done dev, does exactly what it says and is easy to use. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great and easy to use
reviews.comment: I use this ever semester to be sure my phone does not ring during class.  Easy to use.
reviews.author: B Greg Cobb

reviews.title: So far works good
reviews.comment: Nit used it much it turns everything off when i wanted everyday so i can sleep  it comes back on before the alarm just like i set it to busy mom of four  it works no calls after i set it  saves my batter just like i want it too  kids can not use the internet when i set it to airplane  equals  no worrying for busy mom
reviews.author: erinlee cruz

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Really automates the process of silencing and reactivating volume levels for work, sleep, etc.
reviews.author: Martin Quinn
